Name: Esquire #1
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bourbon and orange - sounds simple but is simply tasty.
Nutrition: One serving of Esquire #1 contains 157 calories
